actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing testimony of Linda K. Stiles and Christian A. Steed and the production of documents.

summary.text: Authorizes named congressional employees to appear, testify, and produce documents in the cases of Republicbank, Lubbock, etc., et al. v. United States of America, and the Travelers Insurance Corp. v. United States of America, except concerning matters determined privileged from disclosure.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing testimony of Linda K. Stiles and Christian A. Steed and the production of documents.
